mapper.select: /* [OrdmadeNotfullyReplayMapper.xml] selectOrdmadeNotfullyReplay */ SELECT OD.SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, OD.SHIP_ORDER_ITEM_SEQ AS shipOrderItemSeq, OD.WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, OD.SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidWcs, OD.SHIP_UID_ITEM_SEQ AS shipUidSeq, 'SUPPLY' AS pickingType, OD.INVOICE_NO AS invoiceNo, OD.INVOICE_SEQ AS invoiceSeq, OD.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, OD.WORK_BATCH_NO AS workBatchNo, OD.SKU_CODE AS skuCode, OD.SKU_NAME AS skuName, OD.SKU_SUB_NAME AS skuSubName, ( OD.QTY_NOTFULLY_REQPICK - OD.NOTFULLY_REQ_IF_REQPICK ) AS qtyNotfullyReqpick, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, OH.CREATED_USER AS insertedUser FROM O_WCS.TB_QPS_ORDER_HDR OH JOIN O_WCS.TB_QPS_ORDER_DTL OD ON ( OH.INVOICE_NO = OD.INVOICE_NO ) WHERE OD.ORDMADE_NOTFULLY_TYPE IN ( 'NOTFULLY' ) AND OD.ORDMADE_NOTFULLY_REQ_YN = 'Y' AND OD.NOTFULLY_REQ_IF_YN = 'N'
